BR_text.BRdescription:
OpenCV => 4.0.0
 Operating System / Platform => Debian Buster 64-bit 4.18.0-2-amd64
 Compiler =>  gcc/g++
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
 
 Hi all,
 With reference to this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/commit/b5248da8267faca96da4c0c812b2f51f4dd237d2>commit</denchmark-link>
  a bug was introduced with Python bindings which stopped, as I currently know, the drawKeypoints binding from working.
 I fixed this locally by re-appending the semi-colon, but as current my C++ knowledge is not good enough  I have only submitted an incomplete fix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/VariableDeclared/opencv/commit/6c73812878b597adf757bbf060cefc8032592bf0>here</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 Build latest stable 4.0.0 and attempt to use Python bindings using Python3.6.
